import './App.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([ { name: "Alice Mayer", task: "Call Sam For payments", priority: "High", avatar: "https://mdbcdn.b-cdn.net/img/Photos/new-templates/bootstrap-chat/ava2-bg.webp" }, { name: "Kate Moss", task: "Make payment to Bluedart", priority: "Low", avatar: "https://mdbcdn.b-cdn.net/img/Photos/new-templates/bootstrap-chat/ava2-bg.webp" }, { name: "Danny McChain", task: "Office rent", priority: "Medium", avatar: "https://mdbcdn.b-cdn.net/img/Photos/new-templates/bootstrap-chat/ava3-bg.webp" }, { name: "Alexa Chung", task: "Office grocery shopping", priority: "High", avatar: "https://mdbcdn.b-cdn.net/img/Photos/new-templates/bootstrap-chat/ava5-bg.webp" }, { name: "Ben Smith", task: "Ask for Lunch to Clients", priority: "Low", avatar: "https://mdbcdn.b-cdn.net/img/Photos/new-templates/bootstrap-chat/ava6-bg.webp" }, ]); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', task: '', priority: 'Low', }); const elements = []; for (let i = 0; i < tasks.length; i++) { elements.push( {tasks[i].name} {tasks[i].task}
{tasks[i].priority} priority
); } return (
Team Member Task Priority High priority Low priority Medium priority
{elements}
Team Member Task Priority Actions
); } export default App;
